name: Square Kid
description:
48 Hour Community Game Jam

Theme: Down an unknown road to embrace my fate

Square Kid is a short RPG Turn Based Demo made as part of a 48 hour game jam. It tells of a boy who doesn't belong anywhere until he comes across a temple that houses a pedestal that only he can fit it, finally finding a place where he belongs.

How to play:

Movement:

D - move right

Menu:

W or Arrow Up - UP

S or Arrow Down - Down

Space or Enter - Confirm

Kevin Ho

Karol Szpura (Rensei)
